name: Personal Website
desc: The personal portfolio website you are currently reading! I built this in order to teach myself frontend software and design skills to better support my project team in Project Emory.

name: RIDEmory
desc: A full-stack self-updating database of ride information for Emory students accessible either via the web or through GroupMe. Currently a work in progress, make sure to watch the repository in order to stay up to date with our progress!

name: .dotfiles
desc: A collection of all my custom dotfiles, including a script to automatically install all dependencies, styles, and configurations in a single command.

name: Memly
desc: A 48-hour minimum viable product built for HackATL. Proof of concept for a general purpose spaced-repetition progress tracker app.

name: BibleBot
desc: Scripture from your Discord client to your heart. An integrated quick-reference Discord bot used by 4m+ users across 51,000+ Discord servers.

name: Voice Calculator
desc: A hands-free 15-function calculator written using Sphinx4 and MaryTTS. Comes with custom configuration settings and built-in grammar regex in order to increase speech detection accuracy.
